metadata.name: Pixelglyph Planet Mint Pass
metadata.description: This mint pass is good for one Pixelglyph Planet in the upcoming Invaders! Play to Earn game. Planets will be airdropped to mint pass holders on the Polygon network. You will be able to mine Element 69 from planets using your Star Ship. Star Ships will be airdropped to all Pixelglyph holders.
